hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: My name is Riandry Connor and I build scalable web applications, robust APIs, and modern digital solutions for startups and companies.

instagram-business-scraper-api.title: Instagram Business Scraper API
instagram-business-scraper-api.problem: Companies and agencies needed to automate Instagram Business account management and securely access public data.
instagram-business-scraper-api.solution: I built an asynchronous FastAPI backend integrating public profile scraping, Facebook Graph API messaging, JWT authentication, and PayPal plan control.
instagram-business-scraper-api.result: A SaaS-ready backend architecture that is secure, scalable, and suitable for marketing automation or CRM solutions.

sismo-app.title: Sismo App
sismo-app.problem: Centralizing and visualizing global seismic data in real time.
sismo-app.solution: A full-stack solution using React, Vite, TailwindCSS, and a Ruby on Rails REST API backend.
sismo-app.result: A modern, scalable platform delivering real-time seismic information.

library-app-mobile.title: Library App (Mobile)
library-app-mobile.problem: Users needed a simple and secure way to manage personal libraries on mobile devices.
library-app-mobile.solution: Cross-platform React Native app connected to a Node.js + Firebase backend.
library-app-mobile.result: A secure mobile app with full CRUD functionality.

the-roulette-game.title: The Roulette Game
the-roulette-game.problem: Building an interactive web-based casino experience with real-time betting.
the-roulette-game.solution: Vue 3 + TypeScript frontend with a .NET backend and SQL Server, Docker-ready.
the-roulette-game.result: A complete web game with betting logic and persistent data storage.

caseStudies.noResults: No case studies match your search

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: Technologies I have worked with
technologies.frontendDesc: Experience with React, Angular and modern frameworks
technologies.backendDesc: Experience with Node.js, .NET, Ruby on Rails and APIs

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Full-Stack Developer passionate about building scalable web solutions and robust APIs. I focus on turning ideas into functional products that drive business growth.

items.2021: Started my career with small freelance projects and continuous practice.
items.2022: Expanded my skill set by learning new technologies and collaborating on various projects.
items.2023: Joined a company as a software engineer while continuing personal projects.
items.2024: Delivered frontend and backend solutions as a consultant across multiple industries.
items.2025: Continuing to work on complex solutions and expanding my technical expertise.

seo.defaultDescription: Full-Stack Developer specializing in web applications, APIs, and scalable solutions.
